lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in offering support to those who are willing to work to make their lives better. I believe in hard work and think those that engage in it on a daily basis should be rewarded for it.. I believe in doing things with your hands. I believe in humanity. I believe in human being's abilities to work their way from one space to another, despite where they started from. I believe in generosity and treating others as I would treat myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate to have the free time and money and create music and art because it is what I enjoy doing. I'd like to help others achieve their goals, even if they are not the same as mine. I am a small business owner and understand hard work to make ends meet and then not always having them meet, despite the effort.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: If one can help, then why not? t's a concrete way to help others and to make a little bit of difference in the world.

lender.name: EJS
lender.occupational_info: Translating loan profiles for Kiva is extremely fulfilling as it's great to know your skills can contribute to someone's livelihood. Volunteering is recommended.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I am in the construction side of design, you could say more architectural. I love transforming spaces architecturally and emotionally.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it is a way to help people

lender.name: Randi Helene with family
lender.loan_because: We lend because we can and because it aligns with our core values. We believe that all people should be given opportunities and be treated with respect and dignity.
lender.occupational_info: We recognize the power of entrepreneurship for job creation and poverty alleviation.

lender.name: Kelly Ann Farrell
lender.loan_because: I care. I am visually impaired and deaf and work three days a week at a Community Workshop in Antigonish, Nova Scotia, Canada. I love art and share my works with those who like it.
lender.occupational_info: My work is in a Community Workshop called the CACL (Canadian Association for Community Living). This workshop allows me and others with handicaps to provide a service to our community, through gainful employment.

lender.name: Harwood Estate Vineyards
lender.loan_because: Everyone on our team takes a turn at selecting our investments. It's something we do as a group. We all want to see a world where people are employed and self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: We grow grapes, make wine, and sell our products from our farm, just like farmers everywhere in the world. One dollar from every bottle of wine sold goes into our KIVA lending account.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: Its good to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: Work for an international oil company. I am an engineer working on and in the wells.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to help people in a practical way.
lender.occupational_info: Admin Assistant

lender.name: bikepirate
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to see small businesses and entrepreneurs thrive.

lender.name: Beth & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We desire to live our lives as givers to others as much as possible, even though we don't have much. We feel that is what the Lord Jesus would have us to do.
lender.occupational_info: Beth works with developmentally disabled adults. Jeff is a musician and loves to create cds to give to others.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: be the change you wish to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a religious leader at a college for students from many religious traditions (Christian, Muslim, Hindu, Buddhist, Jewish)

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: If we all 'loaned', the world would be a better place. Some people just need that one chance to succeed in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired USAF. I've been all over the world doing communications work, installing satellite, microwave, fiber optics, telephone, and computer networks.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: It's a way to make a difference.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to improve local communities and the lives of brave members of those communities, especially in Colombia.

lender.name: Tasha
lender.loan_because: because you can't take it with you!

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: We really can make a difference. It's exciting for me to know that people are being helped on a personal level in such a huge way with so little from lenders. My focus is on lending to people in Mexico, Central and South America. Many complain that people from these regions come to the U.S. illegally to work. The fact of the matter is, they would gladly stay in their own countries with their families if they had a way to make a living. Mothers and fathers leave their children with relatives and are gone for many years. Sometimes, young children run away and come to the U.S. looking for the parent that they miss so dearly. Some lose their lives on that journey. Many endure experiences no young person should have to go through.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a photographer and love what I do. Many people over the years have helped me in small ways that have made a tremendous difference for me.
Being a lender on Kiva allows me to do the same for others in a small way and yet have a global impact. It's a really good feeling!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because:
How could I not?? What a wonderful opportunity to make connections with other people across the globe and contribute to their success and future! :)
Rebecca Masters MA
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate the Holyoke Youth Task Force, a coalition of non-profit organizations and state agencies dedicated to the betterment of youth in Holyoke, MA.

lender.name: Clive
lender.loan_because: What a fabulous organisation to set this up & allow people like myself the opportunity to help fellow entrepreneurs out in countries where loans are needed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people take the hassle out of their lives when they are buying or selling Real Estate by handling and taking care of all the details for them throughout the lengthy process of their transaction. Fortunately, I get to do this in a superbly beautiful coastal location named Port Stephens with 25 fabulous beaches to enjoy.

lender.name: Exclusive Tutor
lender.loan_because:
Promoting entrepreneurism creates self-esteem and a better world.
A Kiva loan is not a "hand-out," but rather a "helping hand."
KIva helps others find independence, self-reliancce, and personal responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young adults the tools and skills that help them reach their dreams and change the world for the better.

lender.name: Akber
lender.loan_because: It is important to me that everyone has an opportunity to build a business that provides them with sustenance and meaningful work.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: we are all responsible for making this world a happier, better place.

lender.name: vijayakumar
lender.loan_because: I know the pain and agony of being an entrepreneur. The knowledge , that my small loan can bring smiles to a family some where in the world gives me great happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I like to make a difference . I like to make my contribution to spread happiness and comfort to the poor and down trodden.

lender.name: Muriel
lender.loan_because: every self-employed person should be supported for taking riskes and working so hard.

Soy Beatriz tengo 18 a√±os soy estudiante y trabajo en mi tienda de vestidos, necesito de un generoso prestamo para poder surtir mi tienda ya que esta tienda es la que me da de estudiar soy joven y necesito de su ayuda por que con este trabajo yo puedo seguir estudiando y asi podre ser una persona capacitada para la vida, espero una respuesta faborable.
Beatriz I am 18 years and am a student working on my clothes shop, I need a generous loan to be able to take my shop because this shop is that I'm considering giving young and I need your help with this job that I can further study and can be a person for life, I expect an answer faborable.

lender.name: Martha

lender.loan_because: I like helping friends!

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a better life!

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help people who have initiative and just need a little help to keep their hopes alive.
lender.occupational_info: For most of my life, I have been self-employed and understand the dedication it takes to make a living depending only on oneself.

lender.name: Lorissa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Linda-Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to live in a world where everyone lives in health and dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adult refugees and immigrants, and international students.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who have a desire to be independent and build a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am part owner in two businesses in Washington, DC. My backgroumd also includes working as a senior commercial banking executive and, during the years 1993-1998, I worked on several infrastructure improvement projects in Eastern Europe and South Asia. My small team of experts assisted emerging market countries borrow funds from various Multilateral Developmernt Banks -- primarily the World Bank.

lender.name: Scolaro
lender.loan_because: The crying about the financial crisis in the Western world is deafening. It's good to be reminded that however bad we feel we fare, there are always places where people fare a lot worse. Giving them a chance at a better life is great, and you don't even need to be rich yourself to help.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: it's something good I can do.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I am helping a friend.
lender.occupational_info: Working with people using numbers to report their progress and comply with legal requirements.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I think it is an excellent idea to remove intermediation and contact as direct as possible the people to be funded
lender.occupational_info: Currently I work with car diesel engines. I manage a group of people to modify computer parameters for achieve emissions, fuel consumption and performance values for the engine.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: We are all citizens of the world and this is my way of paying my world taxes.

lender.name: Brian and Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: We are both science teachers (middle and high school) in America.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to support women entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Begonia
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a good idea people work for an own goal, not only to improve their particular situation but also to develop their whole country. In my opinion it is better a loan than charity, because particular people take a particular responsibility and there is a compromise.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I think this is a better use of my money than buying more junk!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people directly, and I like the idea that they are using the loans to build businesses that they can use to support themselves and their families. I have a special love for Tanzania because I used to live there.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university library. I am in charge of the library's web page and making sure the online databases and journals we subscribe to are accessible to our students and teachers, so they can do research, learn, and teach.

lender.name: Francesco
lender.loan_because: Because it is the least I could do. We're in this planet together.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school full time and I work for my money, not everyone has the same opportunities as I do. It only makes sense that I share.

lender.name: Teagan
lender.loan_because: I'm learning that it's important to give back. At 3 years old (in 2011), I just physically conducted my first loan. Even though my mommy has done it previously, I will be an active participant from now on.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I have the privelege to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I do what I can to help my technical team support our users. Our users work to provide health care to a large number of people in the Portland area.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: A great life isn't about great huge things: it'a about small things that make a big differece.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: I help students in New York City's underserved communities to achieve academic, professional and personal success through mentoring, workshops, and writing skills.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: As yourself, "What would LOVE do"? and you will know the answer. Please join us.
lender.occupational_info: l can discribe my work as, offering a little bit of heaven here on earth.

lender.loan_because: SIFE Ryerson is dedicated to fostering entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Taylor

lender.loan_because: others all over the world deserve the same chance I've been given
lender.occupational_info: I work on behalf of land owners who want to change the use of their land and they have to go through community meetings to do it.

lender.occupational_info: Specializing in the Onion and Fisher Price genres.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: poverty is such a big issue and this is one small way that I can help out.

lender.name: Labros
lender.loan_because: We must help our fellow human beings that are less fortunate than we are.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company reduce the magnitude of our problems using systematic team-based problem-solving techniques. It sounds confusing, but it has been very interesting and gratifying.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: because we need to help give others a chance to get in a better place.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because:
I've been so fortunate....raised with such incredible kindness and love. If it wasn't for the direct care and love of a random soul that my Mom met in her time of need, I wouldn't have made it to where I am today.
I should do what I can to help others, the same way that I have been helped myself. :)
lender.occupational_info: What do I do? Well...I do my best to avoid my homework as long as possible. haha.

lender.name: erik kulick
lender.loan_because: I always loved the idea of micro-loans, so when I heard about this program, I had to pitch in.
lender.occupational_info: I am graduating in Geography this December, so hopefully one of the companies that I sent my resume to will higher me so I can support my young family.

lender.name: TImothy
lender.loan_because: this seams like a good way to make positive change.
lender.occupational_info: I do scientific research on the physical world.

lender.name: Angela and Arju
lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity for us to help aspiring (and inspiring!) people.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: We all need help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired after making things including R.L. Winston fly reels, optical instrumentation, vacuum instrumentation and bio-medical instrumentation. Had things I made blow up with the U.S. Space Shuttle.

lender.name: Pearlette
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe that everyone has the ability to give a helping hand to another.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering people to help themselves by helping others.

lender.name: Katie Felten
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make their dreams a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I help people remember everyone they meet and track those relationships over time through an app called Hashable.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It feels great!
lender.occupational_info: I am a second grade teacher in a public school.

lender.name: Reggie
lender.loan_because: I'm happy, and I'm happy because I loan. It's a vicious cycle!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies figure out how to make or save money

lender.name: Payton Family
lender.loan_because: I love to help those people who truly need help.
lender.occupational_info: I read reports from a variety of sources. I try to make sense of it all and compile a single report to be read by important people. I also manage teams and large projects.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to!

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: In Memory of Mojo

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: we all need someone to believe in us.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I care about social justice and equality.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: Because my school wants to help people who don't have enough but want to make a good life, and work hard.

lender.name: Brentano
lender.loan_because: big banks are bad

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I believe fully that everyone should provide a "help up" to others in need. KIVA is but a small way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a girl focused non-profit organization. I am responsible for generating working capital for the corporation through planned giving, member giving campaigns, corporate grants, trusts, and individual doner campaigns.

lender.name: Michael And Amanda
lender.loan_because: I give because I am wired to give. Growing up, my parents, who were much less blessed financially than I am today, gave every chance they got. The spirit of giving is something that is embedded in my genes and that I am trying to carry forward with my children. I give personally because as a MWD supervisor for a major drilling service company, my family and I are blessed, and it's important to share that blessing and give to those others who may be less fortunate and in need. I give because it's the right thing to do. In this global economy we are all neighbors, and when we can, if we can, however we can, we should help one another. I give because as a successful Canadian person living in North America, I feel that I have an obligation to help people, and anyone else who might be in need. In my eyes, Kiva is one of the best ways to make a difference helping people become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to drill for oil and gas

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in humanity

lender.name: Jon and Jen
lender.loan_because: We believe in teaching a man to fish.
lender.occupational_info: Tooth doctor

lender.name: Ed & Nuan
lender.loan_because: Hey, it's fun and I enjoy helping out folks that are hard workers and ambitious. I have a special connection to Cambodia and am intrigued by the ancient Khmer Civilization from its beginning in the Kulen Mountains to its influence on Thai culture.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and counsel International and immigrant students and enjoy my ever continuing cultural and spiritual lessons that I receive from them.

lender.name: Giana
lender.loan_because: I recognise the connection between all farmers all over the world, we have European privilege. I like to support others with greater struggles.
lender.occupational_info: My family farm 250 acres in Ireland - we keep cows for milk from which we make cheese, the whey we feed to pigs, our son then produces bacon, salami and hams. we have 5 Farmer's Markets where we sell our produce.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: I don't find a reason not to!

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: i'm better banker than Lehman Brothers.

lender.name: Dan Yell
lender.loan_because: I am Rad
lender.occupational_info: Rad

lender.name: Aubry
lender.loan_because: If I give $100 a month to charity, that is $100 a month for the rest of my life. If I give $100 a month through microloans, that is $100 a month until repayment on the first wave starts coming back, then it is $200 a month until the second wave starts coming back, and then it is $300 a month.
lender.occupational_info: People break computers. I un-break them.

lender.name: Nestori Virtanen
lender.loan_because: I see no reason why not to loan.
lender.occupational_info: Taking photos in South America during my trip without a destination.

lender.name: connie
lender.loan_because: In memory of my Aunt Iva Mae who died as an infant.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I love my brothers and sisters in Christ. Hopefully, my native country, Philippines will be a part of this organization as I am reserving my very first loan to my fellow kababayan --- I made my very first loan! Thank God ksama napo and pnas d2 :-) -- One need not be born rich nor hold a position to be able to reach out and lend a hand; YOU can make a DIFFERENCE!

lender.name: Neelofer
lender.loan_because: I loan money because it's the least I can do as a person of privilege in a world of unfairly distributed wealth. I loan my time because I hope to maintain a mutually beneficial relationship with the natural world and its inhabitants who give to me in countless ways.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I've received help from family and friends when I needed it and I like to help others. I chose the farming project because I like to garden and understand the importance of having good soil!
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, writer and design consultant for businesses and nonprofit organizations. I paint and exhibit my paintings in galleries. I write and illustrate books. I help people communicate about their businesses and projects by designing their brochures, websites, and brand identities. My husband and I also create books and songs for children. He's a musician and composer.

lender.name: Calvin
lender.loan_because: It helps in a significant way to improve actual lives.
lender.occupational_info: I was an administrator at a major American University for 15 years and retired in October of 2008. I also help to encourage talented young filmmakers produce independent film projects.

lender.name: Fr.Dennis
lender.loan_because: I love the way microlending intersects communitarian ideals and the free market. Helping people bring their ideas to life so that they can meet the needs of their families... As a Christian, this is something I can support.
lender.occupational_info: I am a relatively new Catholic priest (since June 2008) and work at a parish in Memphis. There are 1800 families here, and I make the Sacraments available to them. I preach. I preside at worship. I baptize children and adults. I visit the sick. I teach. I console those in mourning. I help couples prepare for marriage. I pray for you.

lender.name: Misha
lender.loan_because: I give a shit about you.
lender.occupational_info: I take all the material that was recorded for a movie and put it together like a puzzle.

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all have an opportunity, I believe in people¬¥s efforts, and I think this world is unbalanced.
lender.occupational_info: I run a company with some partners so I can bring money home every day. This company does information technologies services to other companies.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." Winston Churchill

lender.name: Holger
lender.loan_because: Former entrepreneur, now working in the environmental sector, I like to support other people to start/develop/maintain their businesses to empower them leading a better life and escape poverty. Kiva is only one thing. There are many other possibilities for support: Plan international, Myc4, fair-pla.net etc.
lender.occupational_info: I try to detect polluntants in the environment

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe in small businesses and I want to support woman-owned businesses in particular. I want to help women succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a lawyer and I am also the mother of two children.

lender.name: ravindren
lender.loan_because: want to help people whom really need for good reason.
lender.occupational_info: mechanical engineer in a well known electronic com.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I work to empower people to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Nicol and Cameron
lender.occupation: Personal Assistant & Owner of a online Granola Biz

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredit loans are an important tool in creating a more just and peaceful world.

lender.name: Sunny Arora
lender.loan_because: I CAN

lender.name: Christoph
lender.occupational_info: I work for a german news site.

lender.name: Christian Riesen
lender.loan_because: A micro loan is for me the best way to battle poverty, although I only have a little to give, the money goes to a good cause and later returns to do more good for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I create simple solutions for complicated problems on the Internet.

lender.name: Jasper
lender.loan_because: everybody should be able to enjoy a nice steak every now and then.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software developer in the IT security industry. That's all I'm allowed to say to strangers ;)

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I loan cause I strongly believe in micro credits as a good solution to support people.

lender.name: Tim and Philippa
lender.loan_because: We believe in people being given a chance to start their own enterprise

lender.name: pip
lender.loan_because: peer pressure forced me to become a kind person ;-)
lender.occupational_info: I help big banks to use their computers and store their data.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in supporting the healthy development of myself and others.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved with computers, telephones. and solar energy

lender.name: a6502
lender.loan_because: peer pressure
lender.occupational_info: building the systems behind big websites

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do..

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: My brother gave me a gift certificate, and said that this is a very cool site. I agree. I think it's neat to meet people from all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly open incoming mail and scan invoices. Document imaging, trying to make the invoicing process as paperless as possible.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do and I always do the least I can do. Actually, I'm very grateful that someone has made it so easy to participate in micro-lending. (UUFF Fredericksburg, VA)
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to help themselves
